com.ibm.mqlight.api.endpoint

Interface Endpoint


  • public interface Endpoint
    Bundles information that the client uses when establishing connections to the system hosting the MQ Light server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File getCertChainFile() 
      String getHost() 
      int getIdleTimeout() 
      String getPassword() 
      int getPort() 
      URI getURI() 
      String getUser() 
      boolean getVerifyName() 
      boolean useSsl() 

    • Method Detail

      • getHost

        String getHost()
        Returns:
        the host name of the system to connect to.

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Returns:
        the port number to connect to.

      • useSsl

        boolean useSsl()
        Returns:
        indicates whether an SSL/TLS protected connection should be used.

      • getCertChainFile

        File getCertChainFile()
        Returns:
        an (optional) X.509 certificate chain file to use for the SSL/TLS protected connection

      • getVerifyName

        boolean getVerifyName()
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating whether the client validates that the CN name of the server's certificate matches its DNS name.

      • getUser

        String getUser()
        Returns:
        the user name to use as part of a SASL PLAIN flow used to authenticate the client. If this value is null then the SASL ANONYMOUS mechanism will be used instead.

      • getPassword

        String getPassword()
        Returns:
        the password to use as part of a SASL PLAIN flow used to authenticate the client.

      • getIdleTimeout

        int getIdleTimeout()
        Returns:
        the maximum idle period between activity (frames) on the connection that the client desires from this endpoint.

      • getURI

        URI getURI()
        Returns:
        The URI for this endpoint, derived from the host and port, and taking into account whether or not SSL/TLS is enabled.
